statements: SELECT item_name, category, price FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price, category FROM virtual_inventory_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, item_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM virtual_inventory_items ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM virtual_inventory_items GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(item_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price, category FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY category, price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price, category FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC, category DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM virtual_inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory_items WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT item_name, quantity, transaction_type, amount FROM virtual_inventory_items INNER JOIN transactions ON virtual_inventory_items.item_id = transactions.item_id WHERE quantity < 5 AND amount >= 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC, amount DESC;

SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions INNER JOIN virtual_inventory_items ON transactions.item_id = virtual_inventory_items.item_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_inventory_item;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM virtual_inventory_item WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM virtual_inventory_item ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, username FROM user WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM virtual_inventory_item WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM virtual_inventory_item WHERE item_name LIKE 'Apple%';
SELECT id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM transaction WHERE total_amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM virtual_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, quantity FROM user_inventory WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM VirtualInventory ORDER BY item_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, price FROM VirtualInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM VirtualInventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' AND transaction_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM VirtualInventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, price FROM VirtualInventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND last_updated > '2021-01-01'
SELECT Users.username, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount FROM Users INNER JOIN Orders ON Users.user_id = Orders.user_id WHERE Users.user_type = 'premium' ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC

SELECT Orders.order_id, Users.username, ShippingDetails.shipping_address FROM Orders INNER JOIN Users ON Orders.user_id = Users.user_id INNER JOIN ShippingDetails ON Orders.order_id = ShippingDetails.order_id WHERE ShippingDetails.delivery_status = 'shipped'

SELECT Transactions.transaction_id, VirtualInventory.item_name, Transactions.transaction_date FROM Transactions INNER JOIN VirtualInventory ON Transactions.item_id = VirtualInventory.item_id WHERE Transactions.transaction_type = 'sale' ORDER BY Transactions.transaction_date ASC
